name: Building Great Junior Portfolio Sites
summary:
Getting noticed as a junior technologist can be a struggle. In this episode, we'll be talking with Steven Pitchford from majestic.com about what your portfolio site needs to have to be noticed by employers.

We'll also be looking at some fantastic portfolio sites and what makes them great .

Well be looking at sites by:

Yingrong Zhao http://www.yingrongzhao.com

Linh Nguyen My http://pinglinh.com

Laurie O'Connor: http://laurieoconnor.com

Vaida http://vaida.me
